dct_title_s: Climate, rainfall probabilities, temperature, sunshine & clouds
dct_alternative_sm: Kenya climate, rainfall probabilities, temperature, sunshine & clouds
dct_description_sm: drawn & printed by Survey of Kenya, Nairobi, 1958.
"Compiled from information supplied by the East African Meteorological Department."
"Rainfall probabilities compiled from maps prepared by Messrs. Glover & Robinson from data supplied by the E.A. Met. Dept., and reproduced by permission of the Director, E.A.A.F.R.O."
"Based on all available data as at 1955."

Plate 14, taken from "Atlas of Kenya : a comprehensive series of new and authentic maps prepared from the national survey and other governmental sources, with gazetteer and notes on pronunciation & spelling". 1962 ed., call# G2530.K4 1962 F.

Includes 4 graphs showing air temperature of coastal areas, 5 bar graphs showing bright sunshine in mean hours/per day, 6 graphs showing air temperature of inland areas, and 7 bar graphs showing mean total cloud cover.
